resp = client.search(
    index="news",
    query={
        "match": {
            "content": "Bird flu"
        }
    },
    aggregations={
        "my_sample": {
            "sampler": {
                "shard_size": 100
            },
            "aggregations": {
                "keywords": {
                    "significant_text": {
                        "field": "content"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
